entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
